member.name: T:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.AssetLoadedHandlerBase`1
member.summary: Base implementation of resource redirect handler that takes care of the plumming for a resource redirector that is interested in either updating or dumping redirected resources.
member.typeparam: The type of asset being redirected.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.AssetLoadedHandlerBase`1.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs the resource redirection handler.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.AssetLoadedHandlerBase`1.CheckDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if the calculated modification path should be checked for a file or directory.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.AssetLoadedHandlerBase`1.IsDumpingEnabled
member.summary: Gets a bool indicating if resource dumping is enabled in the Auto Translator.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.AssetLoadedHandlerBase`1.ReplaceOrUpdateAsset(System.String,`0@,XUnity.ResourceRedirector.IAssetOrResourceLoadedContext)
member.summary: Method invoked when an asset should be updated or replaced.
member.param: This is the modification path calculated in the CalculateModificationFilePath method.
The asset to be updated or replaced.
This is the context containing all relevant information for the resource redirection event.
member.returns: A bool indicating if the event should be considered handled.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.AssetLoadedHandlerBase`1.DumpAsset(System.String,`0,XUnity.ResourceRedirector.IAssetOrResourceLoadedContext)
member.summary: Method invoked when an asset should be dumped.
member.param: This is the modification path calculated in the CalculateModificationFilePath method.
The asset to be updated or replaced.
This is the context containing all relevant information for the resource redirection event.
member.returns: A bool indicating if the event should be considered handled.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.AssetLoadedHandlerBase`1.CalculateModificationFilePath(`0,XUnity.ResourceRedirector.IAssetOrResourceLoadedContext)
member.summary: Method invoked when a new resource event is fired to calculate a unique path for the resource.
member.param: The asset to be updated or replaced.
This is the context containing all relevant information for the resource redirection event.
member.returns: A string uniquely representing a path for the redirected resource.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.AssetLoadedHandlerBase`1.ShouldHandleAsset(`0,XUnity.ResourceRedirector.IAssetOrResourceLoadedContext)
member.summary: Method to be invoked to indicate if the asset should be handled or not.
member.param: The asset to be updated or replaced.
This is the context containing all relevant information for the resource redirection event.
member.returns: A bool indicating if the asset should be handled.

member.name: T:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.RedirectedDirectory
member.summary: Simple facade for accessing files in the redirected directory, even if they are contained in a zip folder.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.RedirectedDirectory.GetFilesInDirectory(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Gets all the files in the directory. May return multiple files with same name due to zip files. Unzipped files will be returned first.
member.param: A standard file path, that MUST be point to a place in the redirected resource directory.
The extensions of the files to return. None if all files should be returned.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.RedirectedDirectory.GetFile(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the file at the specified path. May return multiple files due to zip files. Unzipped files will be returned first.
member.param: A standard file path, that MUST be point to a place in the redirected resource directory.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.RedirectedDirectory.DirectoryExists(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the directory exists in either the file system or in a zip file.
member.param: A standard file path, that MUST be point to a place in the redirected resource directory.
member.returns: A bool indicating if the directory exists.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.RedirectedDirectory.FileExists(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the file exists in either the file system or in a zip file.
member.param: A standard file path, that MUST be point to a place in the redirected resource directory.
member.returns: A bool indicating if the file exists.

member.summary: Constructs a text with encoding from a byte array.

member.summary: Gets the text.

member.name: T:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.TextAssetLoadedHandlerBase
member.summary: Base class for handling text assets. Specifically made for TextAsset because that resource class can be difficult to work with since it only has property getters and no setters.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.TextAssetLoadedHandlerBase.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.TextAssetLoadedHandlerBase.TranslateTextAsset(System.String,UnityEngine.TextAsset,XUnity.ResourceRedirector.IAssetOrResourceLoadedContext)
member.summary: Primary method that is supposed to perform the translation of the text asset. Instead of actually modifying the TextAsset, the text and it's suggested encoding should be returned from the method and the auto translator will ensure that this text/data is returned when requested by the game. Return null to not handle.
member.param: This is the modification path calculated in the CalculateModificationFilePath method.
The text asset with the original content.
This is the context containing all relevant information for the resource redirection event.
member.returns: A TextAndEncoding indicating the text that should replace with TextAsset. Return null to not handle.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.TextAssetLoadedHandlerBase.ReplaceOrUpdateAsset(System.String,UnityEngine.TextAsset@,XUnity.ResourceRedirector.IAssetOrResourceLoadedContext)
member.summary: Method invoked when an asset should be updated or replaced.
member.param: This is the modification path calculated in the CalculateModificationFilePath method.
The asset to be updated or replaced.
This is the context containing all relevant information for the resource redirection event.
member.returns: A bool indicating if the event should be considered handled.

member.name: T:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AutoTranslationPlugin
member.summary: Main plugin class for the AutoTranslator.

member.name: F:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AutoTranslationPlugin.Current
member.summary: Allow the instance to be accessed statically, as only one will exist.

member.name: F:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AutoTranslationPlugin._textsToCopyToClipboardOrdered
member.summary: Keeps track of things to copy to clipboard.

member.name: F:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AutoTranslationPlugin._immediatelyTranslating
member.summary: Texts currently being scheduled for translation by 'immediate' components.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AutoTranslationPlugin.Initialize
member.summary: Initialized the plugin.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AutoTranslationPlugin.LoadTranslations(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads the translations found in Translation.{lang}.txt

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AutoTranslationPlugin.SetText(System.Object,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.TextTranslationInfo)
member.summary: Sets the text of a UI text, while ensuring this will not fire a text changed event.
Translates the string of a UI text or queues it up to be translated by the HTTP translation service.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AutoTranslationPlugin.WaitForTextStablization(System.Object,XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.TextTranslationInfo,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Action{System.String},System.Action)
member.summary: Utility method that allows me to wait to call an action, until the text has stopped changing. This is important for 'story' mode text, which 'scrolls' into place slowly.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AutoTranslationPlugin.WaitForTextStablization(XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.UntranslatedText,System.Single,System.Action,System.Action)
member.summary: Utility method that allows waiating to call an action, until the text has stopped changing. This is important for 'story' mode text, which 'scrolls' into place slowly. This version is for global text, where the component cannot tell us if the text has changed itself.

member.summary: Unity lifecycle callback invoked when the component is first enabled.

member.summary: Unity update loop used to drive translation tasks and UI state.

member.summary: Unity GUI callback for rendering plugin UI overlays.

member.summary: Re-enables the Auto Translator functionality after having disabled it thorugh DisableAutoTranslator

member.summary: An implementation of ITranslateEndpoint that simplifies implementing the interface based on an external program.

member.summary: Gets the id of the ITranslateEndpoint that is used as a configuration parameter.

member.summary: Gets a friendly name that can be displayed to the user representing the plugin.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Endpoints.ExtProtocol.ExtProtocolEndpoint.MaxConcurrency
member.summary: Gets the maximum concurrency for the endpoint. This specifies how many times "Translate" can be called before it returns.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Endpoints.ExtProtocol.ExtProtocolEndpoint.MaxTranslationsPerRequest
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of translations that can be served per translation request.

member.summary: Gets the path to the executable that should be communicated with.

member.summary: Gets the arguments that should be supplied to the executable.

member.summary: Gets the minimum delay to wait before sending a new request.

member.summary: Gets the maximum delay to wait before sending a new request.

member.summary:
Called during initialization. Use this to initialize plugin or throw exception if impossible.
Must set the ExecutablePath and optionally the Arguments property.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Endpoints.ExtProtocol.ExtProtocolEndpoint.Update
member.summary: Update callback.

member.summary: Attempt to translated the provided untranslated text. Will be used in a "coroutine", so it can be implemented in an asynchronous fashion.

member.summary: Disposes the endpoint and kills the external process.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Endpoints.ExtProtocol.ExtProtocolEndpoint.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the endpoint and kills the external process.

member.summary: Completes the translation by providing the translated text.

Completes the translation by providing the translated texts.
The indices of the translations must match the indices of the untranslated texts.

member.summary: Interface used in the context of translating a text.

member.summary: Public API Surface for the Auto Translator Plugin.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.ITranslator.TranslateAsync(System.String,System.Action{XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.TranslationResult})
member.summary: Queries the plugin to provide a translated text for the untranslated text. If the translation cannot be found in the cache, it will make a request to the translator selected by the user.
member.param: The untranslated text to provide a translation for.
Callback to completion of the translation.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.ITranslator.TranslateAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Action{XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.TranslationResult})
member.summary: Queries the plugin to provide a translated text for the untranslated text. If the translation cannot be found in the cache, it will make a request to the translator selected by the user.
member.param: The untranslated text to provide a translation for.
Scope to be used during translation cache lookup.
Callback to completion of the translation.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.ITranslator.TryTranslate(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Queries the plugin to provide a translated text for the untranslated text. If the translation cannot be found in the cache, the method returns false and returns null as the untranslated text.
member.param: The untranslated text to provide a translation for.
The translated text.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.ITranslator.TryTranslate(System.String,System.Int32,System.String@)
member.summary: Queries the plugin to provide a translated text for the untranslated text. If the translation cannot be found in the cache, the method returns false and returns null as the untranslated text.
member.param: The untranslated text to provide a translation for.
Scope to be used during translation cache lookup.
The translated text.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Properties.Resources.StaticTranslations
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to X軸=X Y軸=Y Z軸=Z アイシャドウの種類=Eyeshadow Type アイシャドウの色=Eye Shadow Color アイシャドウの設定=Eye Shadow アイテム=Item アイテムリスト=Item List アイドル=Idol アイドルニーソックス=Idol Kneesocks アイドルに戻す=Default Idol アイドルパンプス=Idol Pumps アイドルワンピ=Idol One-Piece アイドル手袋=Idol Gloves アイドル服=Idol Outfit アイラインの色=Eyeliner Color アイライン上の種類=Upper Eyeliner Type アイライン下の種類=Lower Eyeliner Type アウターの種類=Outerwear Type アウトラインの幅=Outline Thickness アウトラインの濃さ=Outline Density アウトラインの色=Outline Color アウトラインの色を個別に設定する=Enable Outline Color Adjustment アクセサリ= [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.summary: This is a simplfied version of the text cache this plugin uses to store translations.

member.name: F:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.SimpleTextTranslationCache._translations
member.summary: Internal translation dictionary used to store translations.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.SimpleTextTranslationCache.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a translation cache and loads the translations in the specified file.
member.param: This is the file containing the translations to be loaded.
This is a bool indicating if the translations in the file specified should be loaded if possible.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.SimpleTextTranslationCache.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a translation cache and loads the translations in the specified file.
member.param: This is the file containing the translations to be loaded.
This is a bool indicating if the translations in the file specified should be loaded if possible.
This is a bool indicating if the first parameter is a directory.
Indicates whether or not to allow translations read later to override translation read earlier during initialization.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.SimpleTextTranslationCache.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.IO.Stream},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a translation cache, using the specified file as an output file, but without loading the file. This constructor will only read the input streams.
member.param: This is the output file.
This is the input streams with translations that will populate the cache.
Indicates whether or not to allow translations read later to override translation read earlier during initialization.
Indicates if the input streams should be closed after use.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.SimpleTextTranslationCache.LoadedFile
member.summary: Gets the file that was used to initialize the SimpleTextTranslationCache.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.SimpleTextTranslationCache.IsDirectory
member.summary: Gets a bool indicating if the LoadedFile is a directory.

member.summary: Indicates if the translation cache is empty.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.SimpleTextTranslationCache.HasTranslated(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given text has already been translated. Only use in relation to check if new translations should be added to the internal dictionary.

member.summary: Adds the translations to the internal cache.

member.name: T:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.TranslationRegistry
member.summary:
Entry point for manipulating translations that have been loaded by the plugin.
Methods on this interface should be called during plugin initialization. Preferably during the Start callback.

member.summary: Obtains the translations registry instance.

member.name: T:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.ITranslationRegistry

Package containing translations.

Package containing translations.
